properties.name: Enter the Remote ID

properties.name: CleanUp -- true or false
properties.description: This variable is delete the created objects. by default its true and delete all objects , if user want to keep objects for debug purpose, or run workflow after remote automation run.  then set false and it will not delete the objects , user should delete all objects once debug is completed.

Create a Module integration and Map the Existing Remote and Verify the Target Creation for the same
Import a workflow which is having,  create a wf , add action , validate and run and delete using a target created from above integration.
And run workflows and verify the wf status using module integration target
